LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByCorpses.label: Pyrolyze corpses (360)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByCorpses.description: Pyrolyze 360 kilograms of corpses (about 6 grown-up humans) into chemfuel. Corpses must be non-mechanical in nature.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunks.label: Pyrolyze junk (4)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunks.description: Pyrolyze 4 kilograms of organic junk into 7 chemfuel. Junk must consist of non-smeltable and burnable materials.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunksPlus.label: Pyrolyze junk (28)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunksPlus.descriptio: Pyrolyze 28 kilograms of organic into 35 chemfuel. Junk must consist of non-smeltable and burnable materials.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunks.label: Recycle junk (8)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunks.description: Smelt 8 kilograms of junk and extract resources. Junk must consist of smeltable materials.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunksPlus.label: Recycle junk (32)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunksPlus.description: Recycle 32 kilograms of junk and extract resources. Junk must consist of smeltable materials.
LanguageData.FTC_KitchenCookMealSimple.label: Cook simple meal x8
LanguageData.FTC_KitchenCookMealSimple.description: Cook 8 simple meals from one ingredient.
